settings.title: Japan's No.1 Skincare Brand
settings.text:
Japanese skincare techniques focusing on hand touch to assess and improve skin moisture, smoothness, firmness, and elasticity.

Transformative skincare with gentle stretching, patting, and massage techniques to enhance product absorption and improve skin health.

One Super Hydrator Lotion is sold every 2 seconds in Japan.

settings.title: Find Your Perfect Skincare Match
settings.text:
Discover the ideal skincare regimen tailored just for you. Answer a few simple questions to receive personalized recommendations tailored to your unique skin needs.

Take the guesswork out of skincare and start your journey to healthier, radiant skin today.

settings.title: Join Our Loyalty Club
settings.text: Sign up today and Get Radiant Rewards with Hada Labo Tokyo – Earn Points, Redeem Exclusive Perks.

settings.title: Amanda G.
settings.text: I love this product! It's affordable, and a little goes a long way. Keeps my face moisturized all day with a healthy glow. I often get compliments on my skin. It doesn’t take much when using it, which is great.

settings.title: Katarina
settings.text: You won’t regret this! My favorite skincare product. The masks deeply moisturize, leaving my skin feeling alive and nourished. I often receive compliments after using them, which is a nice bonus!

settings.title: Queen Padilla
settings.text: It feels smooth and dries quickly. Overall, a good deal. I’m curious to see how it performs long term with my skin.

settings.title: Sailor
settings.text: I should sign up for the subscribe and save option. I've bought this monthly for six months. My skin is clearer, pores look great, and I’ve gained confidence. I don’t need foundation anymore after a few weeks of use.

settings.title: Himalayan Consulting
settings.text: Lasting, glowing moisture. My first Hada Labo bottle was a gift, now I’m on my fourth order. This serum provides instant moisture and a nice glow. It’s long-lasting, fragrance-free, and travel-friendly. I’ve experienced no breakouts or irritation.

settings.title: Katie J.
settings.text: I love this brand! It makes a noticeable difference in my skin. No residue and a great moisturizer. It goes on smooth, leaving my skin feeling soft. I’ve already seen improvements in my skin.

settings.title: Christine F.
settings.text: Love these sheet masks after a day in the sun! They are incredibly refreshing and help to restore moisture and calm my skin.

settings.title: Teresa
settings.text: I’ve bought this twice, which means I liked it and it worked for me. It hydrates well, absorbs quickly, and has no scent. It doesn't feel heavy. While it doesn't eliminate wrinkles, my skin feels softer and more hydrated.

settings.title: Jonas
settings.text: Great face cream, but faulty shipping. It’s the only one where I’ve seen visible changes in my skin. Unfortunately, shipping can be difficult, with customs issues and sometimes the product not arriving at all.

settings.title: Alice P.
settings.text: I use this product daily. It blends well with my skincare and makeup routine and has a soft finish. It’s affordable compared to pricier products. Despite my combo skin type prone to breakouts, it works well. Definitely recommend!

settings.title:
Revitalize Your Skin
with Our Exclusive
Super-Hyaluronic Acid
settings.text:
Revitalize your skin with Hada Labo Tokyo's Anti-Aging Lotion Super Hydrator, enriched with Super-Hyaluronic Acid. This Japanese innovation deeply penetrates for a plump, smooth complexion and multi-layered hydration. Apply after cleansing, before serum and moisturizer, to elevate your skincare routine.

  • A unique blend of several different molecular weights of Hyaluronic Acid for multi-layered hydration
  • Micro HA penetrates skin more deeply, HA+ is twice as powerful as regular HA, and Macro HA – the largest molecule, locks in moisture
  • Experience the Mochi Mochi effect with the layering of ultra-hydrating skincare, achieving a dewy and radiant complexion.
  • Hada Labo Tokyo's Super Hydrator Lotion: Not a moisturizer, but a potent, ultra-light hydration step. The perfect way to deliver the benefits of Super Hyaluronic Acid

settings.text: The newest addition to the Vinoperfect range, achieve mega-watt radiance with the Vinoperfect Brightening Micropeel Foam, a favourite of TikTok star Amelia Olivia that works to lessen the look of dark spots and sweep away dead skin cells.
